name: 阿兰·凯利
introduction: Dublin born and raised, Alan studied Musical Theatre at Laine Theatre Arts and Speech & Drama at Trinity College, both in London. He has lived in Zurich, Vienna, Stuttgart and Berlin, but moved to New York after winning a Green Card in the lottery (YUP!), a place he now calls home. After studying improv at UCB, Screenwriting at Gotham Writers and five short years later, he became a US citizen. He love dogs and is in a love/hate relationship with CitiBike. He hopes to one day own his own. A dog that is, not a bike.
